attributes.action: stop wasting money on persecuting smokers and do something about gun crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Something is seriously wrong. There is a major crime problem in the UK, yet what does the government do? Start another anti-smoking campaign. This is a complete waste of public money. What about tackling the _real_ problems first?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
